Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class BT_ParentNode

Parent nodes are nodes who can have children nodes attached to them and can be connected to other parent nodes by using input/output ports. This type of node can be placed and dragged inside the graph and hold a position in it.

DisconnectNode(BT_ParentNode)

Remove a node connected to this parent node. Child node will be disconnected from this parent node and will no longer be a child of this node.
